results.title: Metformin Treatment Attenuates Brain Inflammation and Rescues PACAP/VIP Neuropeptide Alterations in Mice Fed a High-Fat Diet
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Treatment Attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Encephalitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004660 @@@Brain Inflammation@@@ and Rescues @GENE_ADCYAP1 @GENE_11516 @@@PACAP@@@/@GENE_VIP @GENE_22353 @@@VIP@@@ Neuropeptide Alterations in @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ Fed a High-Fat Diet

citations.NLM: Mandwie M, Karunia J, Niaz A, Keay KA, Musumeci G, Rennie C, McGrath K, Al-Badri G, Castorina A. Metformin Treatment Attenuates Brain Inflammation and Rescues PACAP/VIP Neuropeptide Alterations in Mice Fed a High-Fat Diet Int J Mol Sci. 2021 Dec 20;22(24):. PMID: 34948457

results.title: Metformin Prevents NDEA-Induced Memory Impairments Associated with Attenuating Beta-Amyloid, Tumor Necrosis Factor-Alpha, and Interleukin-6 Levels in the Hippocampus of Rats
results.text_hl: It suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may protect against @CHEMICAL_Diethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004052 @@@NDEA@@@-triggered @DISEASE_Memory_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory issues@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Encephalitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004660 @@@brain inflammation@@@.

citations.NLM: Ponce-Lopez T, González Álvarez Tostado JA, Dias F, Montiel Maltez KH. Metformin Prevents NDEA-Induced Memory Impairments Associated with Attenuating Beta-Amyloid, Tumor Necrosis Factor-Alpha, and Interleukin-6 Levels in the Hippocampus of Rats Biomolecules. 2023 Aug 24;13(9):. PMID: 37759689
